item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Extended Stay America Logo
Extended Stay America, Inc., headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, is the operator of an economy apartment hotel chain in the United States and Canada. As of December 31, 2019, the company owned and operated 557 hotel properties consisting of approximately 61,900 rooms and franchised or managed 73 hotel properties consisting of approximately 7,500 rooms. Prior to June 2021, when the company was acquired by Blackstone Real Estate and the Starwood Capital Group, it was publicly traded as a “paired share” with ESH Hospitality, Inc.
You can download theExtended Stay Americalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Extended Stay America
item.description: Extended Stay America, Inc., headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, is the operator of an economy apartment hotel chain in the United States and Canada. As of December 31, 2019, the company owned and operated 557 hotel properties consisting of approximately 61,900 rooms and franchised or managed 73 hotel properties consisting of approximately 7,500 rooms. Prior to June 2021, when the company was acquired by Blackstone Real Estate and the Starwood Capital Group, it was publicly traded as a “paired share” with ESH Hospitality, Inc.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
AmericInn Hotels Logo AmericInn is an American hotel franchise founded in 1984 in the suburban Twin Cities. The chain is a mid-priced, limited-service hotel. As of December 31, 2018, it consists of 204 locations with 12,072 rooms throughout the United States, with the majority located in the Midwestern United States. Source
You can download theAmericInn Hotelslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: AmericInn Hotels
item.description: AmericInn is an American hotel franchise founded in 1984 in the suburban Twin Cities. The chain is a mid-priced, limited-service hotel. As of December 31, 2018, it consists of 204 locations with 12,072 rooms throughout the United States, with the majority located in the Midwestern United States. Source

<! [CDATA[
Park Hotels & Resorts Logo Park Hotels & Resorts is a real estate investment trust focused on hotel properties, based in Tysons, Virginia. It was formed in 2017 as a spin-off from Hilton Worldwide. Source
You can download thePark Hotels and Resortslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Park Hotels and Resorts
item.description: Park Hotels & Resorts is a real estate investment trust focused on hotel properties, based in Tysons, Virginia. It was formed in 2017 as a spin-off from Hilton Worldwide. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Holiday Inn Logo
Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source
You can download theHoliday Innlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Holiday Inn
item.description: Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source
